value.title: Get creative with buttons in Power BI!

value.excerpt: There are many scenarios that you might want to implement a conditional expression. value.excerpt: You can have a distinct count calculation in multiple places in Power BI, through DAX code, using the Visual's aggregation on a field, or even in Power Query. This is a feature that helps both citizen data analysts and developers.

value.title: Relationship in Power BI with Multiple Columns
